name: Forest Monster (itch)
description:
This is my contribution for Ludum Dare 33. I did a little casual game with a cute monster frog which is trying to catch all flies around it. In order to move, click on the screen and frog follows the last point which has been selected. But be careful because you must avoid all bombs and catch some bonus so as to decrease time flow. I did three game modes ARCADE, TIMER and ZEN. Try it ++

PS : source code of this project (ready for mobile device) is available for less than 7$. This game has been developed on Unity 5.2 - feel free to contact me if you need help developing your own project.
